playlist-master-volume.masterHint: Sets the volume for every sound in this playlist.
playlist-master-volume.applied: Applied master volume {value} to all sounds.
playlist-master-volume.errorApply: Failed to apply master volume. See console.
playlist-master-volume.errorPreSubmit: Failed to set volumes before updating playlist. See console.
playlist-master-volume.reload.title: Reload Required
playlist-master-volume.reload.message: Module configuration has changed. Reload now to apply?
playlist-master-volume.settings.quickEdi: Show the {gear} shortcut in the Playlists sidebar (only for users who can edit the playlist).
playlist-master-volume.settings.position: Choose where the {gear} shortcut is displayed.
